vsParam:
Thank you, [px]!
Now I just need to bring this medicine to the villagers!

Yeah. They will be relieved upon
seeing you deliver medicine to them.

No... It's just, what Captain said earlier,
slapped me awake...

What a knight ought to do is not just protecting people,
but also to be their spiritual support too...

After being enlightened by Captain, I now realize... Those knights
protecting my hometown, also provided spiritual care to us...

Hehehe... Ha ha ha ha!
Ha ha ha ha ha!?

Uh, what's wrong with you, Cresson!?
Why are you suddenly laughing like that!?
Does Peppermint have something on her face!?

No... Hehe. I just realize that it takes more efforts
than I could imagine to become a knight of my dream...

You are right...
But I have faith in you.

Yeah. Think about it,
even someone like Tandrion was once a knight, right?

Compared to him... right? Although you are a guard now,
you are way more chivalrous than him.

Ha ha, indeed! In this sense,
maybe being a knight is easier than you think.

No no, that's not true!
Captain is a noble man with chivalry!

But... er.
I must become a knight one day.

The most powerful knight in the kingdom... who is strong enough
to protect everyone and to be their... spiritual support as well.

That's right. That's our Cresson!
You must work harder to get there, huh?

Sure! After I deliver the medicine,
I'll go ask my Captain to continue training me!

I'll hurry to the village then!
Thanks, guys!

The most powerful knight in the kingdom... huh?
Hehe, maybe Cresson will realize his goal pretty soon.

Hehe, yeah.
Let's all root for him to reach his goal earlier.

Hehe, I can't stand him. What a troublesome subordinate.
But that also speaks for the need to train him... Ha-ha.
